Joe,
i am basically trying to find out where, what and how to change if i need
the output in word doc. nobody wud want to sit and save as every report into
word doc. probaby one more similar ant task with a bit of changes?

Thanks for the reply.

BYe



On 10/13/05, J. B. Rainsberger <jbrains@...> wrote:
>
>  Balraj Goulikar wrote:
> > Hi All,
> >
> > Had a query about getting JUnit reports in word document format. There
> is an
> > ant task to get it in html but not in rtf or word document. Any way to
> > convert that?
>
> Didn't we already answer that? Word can open HTML documents
> automatically. If you need it in Word format, then Save As...
> --
